price: Na walitaka kukukera ili uitoke nchi. Na hapo wao wasingeli bakia humo ila kwa muda mchache tu.
arabic: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَسۡتَفِزُّونَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيُخۡرِجُوكَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَإِذٗا لَّا يَلۡبَثُونَ خِلَٰفَكَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
footnotes: Na makafiri wa Makka wamejaribu, na walikaribia kukuudhi mpaka wakutoe kwenye ardhi ya Makka kwa uadui wao na chuki zao. Na lau yangeli kuwa hayo, basi wao nao wasingeli baki humo ila muda mchache tu, kisha washindwe katika hayo mambo yao, na hukumu iwe ya Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in kādū layastafizzūnaka mina al-arḍi liyukh'rijūka min'hā wa-idhan lā yalbathūna khilāfaka illā qalīlan
